title: Jar And Cover
description: Medium thin greenish glass. Domed foot with folded-under edge, supports inverted pear-shaped body with elongated narrow portion, and short cylin- drical neck. Raised cover with flattened knob, has extedned horizontal rim to rest on neck of jar, and cylindrical collar which fits inside the neck of jar.

tombstone.epitaph:
Jar And Cover.
glass. Bequest of Georgiana L. McClellan. 1953-17-149-a,b.
